Articles.Content: Hello, i just wanted to know how to open the parachute of the astronauts pls ? Like i played to ksp for a long time and im a good player but i never used the Kerbal's parachute lmao and there is any button or keyboard shortcut in the settings to open it. Ty
Try pressing 'p'. If it doesn't work, right-click on the Kerbal and hit 'deploy chute'. For some reasons the chute itself doesn't deploy if you're under 1 m/s.
